title: Multiclass Sparse Logistic Regression
description: In this lab, we will explore how to use Multiclass Sparse Logistic Regression on the `20newsgroups` dataset using scikit-learn. We will compare the performance of Multinomial logistic regression with one-versus-rest L1 logistic regression.
